definitions.definition: An inland traditional county of Wales , bounded to the north by Denbighshire , to the east and southeast by Shropshire , to the south by Radnorshire , to the southwest by Cardiganshire and to the west and northwest by Merionethshire .

main_definition: An inland traditional county of Wales , bounded to the north by Denbighshire , to the east and southeast by Shropshire , to the south by Radnorshire , to the southwest by Cardiganshire and to the west and northwest by Merionethshire .
